# 与神回家

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yushen-huijia
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yushen-huijia
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yushen-huijia
yushen-huijia <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yushen-huijia
yushen-huijia <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
